job_title: Health Data Abstractor in Parma, OH
pros: Friendly co-workers,  nice clean  place to work , willing to train employees
cons: Cafeteria  could stay open longer for second shift employees

review_title: Financial struggling hospital with lots of nice people
pros: Longevity of staff, somewhat of a "family" type atmosphere.   Survival is more likely now that they are joining to University Hospital.
cons: Cuts, cuts, and cuts - being squeezed out of the market by the big guys.  Sometimes rash decisions that appear to be knee jerk reactions.  Inability to pick a strategy and follow through.

review_title: Great place to be part of the community and grow as a team member in healthcare
